body_html:
You actually need a machine with a NVIDIA gpu, docker or not. When I try on my machine, I can confirm that local = True does not fix the problem for me.
…
On Mon, Jan 9, 2017 at 1:56 PM, Damien Martin-Guillerez < ***@***.***> wrote: I need to investigate a bit more. removing local = True should do the trick... I'll try to reproduce tomorrow, all I need is docker right? — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. body:
You actually need a machine with a NVIDIA gpu, docker or not.
When I try on my machine, I can confirm that local = True does not fix the
problem for me.

On Mon, Jan 9, 2017 at 1:56 PM, Damien Martin-Guillerez <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I need to investigate a bit more. removing local = True should do the
> trick... I'll try to reproduce tomorrow, all I need is docker right?
>
